Outcome.DescriptionText: As your troops approach the ring, they notice it is unpowered, and probably damaged to a certain degree. In an attempt to see if it's still operational, they power it up. The ring starts to vibrate slightly, and they watch as an unstable wormhole is created within the ring. Suddenly, the wormhole collapses, creating a devastating wave of destruction that propagates across the planet!
Outcome.ConfirmText: I think we screwed it up

Outcome.DescriptionText: As your troops approach the ring, they notice it is unpowered, and probably damaged to a certain degree. In an attempt to see if it's still operational, they power it up. The ring starts to vibrate slightly, and they watch as a wormhole is created within the ring, which appears to be stable! Unfortunately, the vibrations lure a horde of antlions that immediately attack the ring, destroying it in the process. Only a few valuable materials from the ring were left intact.

Unfortunately, the unique energy output of the wormhole has drawn the attention of a remnant fleet, which after warping in began bombing the planet, destroying the ring in the process.
